articles.title: Coroner: Columbus-area drug overdose deaths still rising
articles.description: COLUMBUS, Ohio (AP) — The number of fatal overdoses in the county that includes Ohio's capital city jumped during the first nine months of 2019 compared to the same period in 2018, the county coroner reported Monday.
articles.content:

articles.title: Roger Penske takes ownership of Indianapolis Motor Speedway
articles.description: Roger Penske completed his purchase of Indianapolis Motor Speedway on Monday, becoming just the fourth owner of the historic facility and subsidiaries that include the IndyCar Series.
articles.content:
Roger Penske completed his purchase of Indianapolis Motor Speedway on Monday, becoming just the fourth owner of the historic facility and subsidiaries that include the IndyCar Series.
